meanings.definition: To lower and raise the head quickly, as to indicate agreement or acknowledgment.
meanings.sent1: She would nod her head in agreement during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The teacher nodded at the student to come to the front of the class.
meanings.sent3: The dog would nod eagerly whenever it heard the word 'treat'.
meanings.sent4: The trees seemed to nod in the breeze, as if agreeing with each other.
meanings.sent5: He nodded vigorously to show he understood the instructions.

meanings.definition: A quick downward and upward movement of the head, as in agreement or acknowledgment.
meanings.sent1: With a nod, she confirmed that she would attend the party.
meanings.sent2: The nod of approval from the boss made him feel proud of his work.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's nod of understanding brought a smile to her teacher's face.
meanings.sent4: The nod of the audience signaled their appreciation for the performance.
meanings.sent5: He gave a nod of thanks to the stranger who held the door open for him.
